definition: to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: In sum, few people remain at subsistence level.
sentences.chinese: 總的來說，很少人一直掙扎在溫飽水平。

sentences.english: Food was the biggest concern of the families and of the government.
sentences.chinese: 溫飽曾經是中國家庭和中國政府最關心的大問題。

sentences.english: The FullBellyProject also has a pedal -powered sheller.
sentences.chinese: 全民溫飽計劃還有一種是腳踏式的剝殼機。

sentences.english: The Full Belly Project also has a pedal-powered sheller.
sentences.chinese: 溫飽工程也有一種踏板動力脫殼機。

sentences.english: Several million of people have lived near or below the breadline for almost two decades.
sentences.chinese: 貧困線以下或溫飽問題還沒有解決的人口仍有百萬。

sentences.english: I've had it easy, served up on all life's silver platters like a satrap.
sentences.chinese: 我已經很易於像總督一樣爲人們的溫飽盡職盡責。

definition: to live one's life/to make a living
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
to worry/to fret/to be anxious/to become sad
not having to worry about clothes and food (idiom)/to be provided with the basic necessities
dignity/face (as in "losing face")/honorable/creditable/(of sb's appearance) presentable/respectable
